Name: :envvar:`REDDIT_USERNAME`
Description: The username of your Reddit bot

Name: :envvar:`MEME_DOWNLOAD`
Description: Whether to download the memes or not

Name: :envvar:`MEME_DIR`
Description: Where to download them if :envvar:`MEME_DOWNLOAD` is enabled

Name: :envvar:`MEME_ITEM_LIMIT`
Description: "The maximum number of items to fetch
